revised_title: Instability in Large Deflections of Elastic Plates: Curved Rectangular Plates and Flat Square Plates
tldr: This article investigates the behavior of thin-walled structures, particularly curved rectangular plates and flat square plates, when subjected to large deflections. The author derives expressions for the bending of these plates and finds that they exhibit a characteristic type of instability. The critical bending moment at which this instability occurs is also determined.
